task.title: Managing recording
task.shortdesc: You can control how long meeting recordings are available and also disable the recording feature.

taskbody.context:
Storing and Archiving Recordings
Recordings are available for 3 days by default. To change this value, update the EXPIRES_IN_DAYS in the custom.env on Docker and the recordingsExpireInDays in the helm/values.yaml on Kubernetes. For more information to apply the changes, see .
Disable Recordings
If you want to disable the ability to record meetings, use one of the following procedures:
Docker
In the .env file, specify the following setting:
ENABLE_RECORDING=0
Kubernetes
In the values.yaml file, specify the following setting:enableRecording = false
